book.mysticalagriculture.name: Agriculture Mystique
book.mysticalagriculture.landing_text: Agriculture Mystique est un mod basé sur le concepte de faire pousser ses ressources. Ce livre sera votre guide pour utuliser toutes les fonctionalités d'Agriculture Mystique. $(br2)$(l:https://blakesmods.com/guides/mysticalagriculture)Cliquez ici pour plus d'info et des guides plus détaillés.$()
book.mysticalagriculture.category.basics: This section goes over the different things required to get started in Mystical Agriculture. $(br2)$(l:https://blakesmods.com/guides/mysticalagriculture/gameplay/getting-started)Click here for a detailed Getting Started guide.$()
book.mysticalagriculture.category.advanc: This section goes over some of the more advanced content that comes after you've gotten established.
This section goes over the Nether content as well as the mob soul content required for creating and using mob drop based crops. $(br2)$(l:https://blakesmods.com/guides/mysticalagriculture/gameplay/collecting-mob-souls)Click here for a detailed guide on collecting Mob Souls.$()
book.mysticalagriculture.category.elemen: This section goes over Awakened Supremium and other elemental essence based content.
book.mysticalagriculture.category.machin: This section goes over the different machine type blocks in Mystical Agriculture.
book.mysticalagriculture.category.tinker: This section goes over Essence Tools/Armor as well as the tinkering system. $(br2)$(l:https://blakesmods.com/guides/mysticalagriculture/gameplay/upgrading-essence-gear)Click here for a detailed guide on upgrading Essence Tools/Armor.$()
book.mysticalagriculture.category.augmen: This section goes over each of the Augments and what they do.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.inferium_: Inferium Essence is one of the two base materials in Mystical Agriculture. It's used in the creation of pretty much everything in the mod. You can $(bold)usually$() obtain Inferium Essence by killing hostile or passive mobs, mining it from the ground, or growing it.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.prosperit: Prosperity Shards are the other of the two base materials in Mystical Agriculture. They are used to create magical variations of basic materials. You can $(bold)usually$() obtain Prosperity Shards by mining them from the ground.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.infusion_: The Infusion Crystal is used to create higher tier essences.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.inferium_: Inferium Seeds are one of the main ways to collect Inferium Essence. They can be grown on any farmland, but are most efficient on $(l:basics/essence_farmland)Essence Farmland$().
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.overworld: Inferium Ore $(bold)usually$() spawns between Y level -32 and 64 in the Overworld.
Prosperity Ore $(bold)usually$() spawns between Y level -60 and 24 in the Overworld.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.resource_: Resource Crops are the heart and soul of what makes Mystical Agriculture so great. However, there are some special properties of resource crops that should be noted. $(br2)$(li)Resource Crops can not be grown using Bonemeal. $(li)Resource Crops do not drop a second seed unless planted on $(l:basics/essence_farmland)Essence Farmland$().
Resource Crops are $(bold)usually$() created using an $(l:basics/infusion_altar)Infusion Altar$().
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.essence_f: Essence Farmland increases the output efficiency of Mystical Agriculture crops in multiple ways. They are listed on the following page. $(br2)You can create Essence Farmland by either right-clicking on Farmland in-world with an essence or by crafting it.

$(li)Crops will $(bold)usually$() have a 10 percent chance to drop a second seed when planted on any tier Essence Farmland. $$(li)Crops will have an additional 10 percent chance to drop a second seed when planted on the corresponding tier Essence Farmland. $(li)Inferium Seeds will drop more essences when planted on higher tier Essence Farmland.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.growth_ac: Growth Accelerators are used to increase plant growth speed. They apply random growth ticks to the first plant placed above them within the specified range. $(br2)You can stack multiple Growth Accelerators of any tier as long as the plant is within range.

The range of the Growth Accelerator is based on it being placed underneath the farmland. $(br2)$(l:https://blakesmods.com/guides/mysticalagriculture/gameplay/speeding-up-crop-growth)Click here for a detailed guide on using Growth Accelerators.$()
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.watering_: Watering Cans are used to accelerate crop growth using manual* labor. To fill one up, simply right click on a Water source block.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.infusion_: The Infusion Altar is a crafting structure that is $(bold)usually$() used to create Mystical Agriculture seeds. The structure consists of 1 Infusion Altar and 8 Infusion Pedestals. $(br2)Once you have a recipe put in place, you just need to activate the altar with a Redstone signal.

Placing the Infusion Altar in world will show you where to place your pedestals. $(br2)$(l:https://blakesmods.com/guides/mysticalagriculture/gameplay/creating-seeds)Click here for a detailed guide on using the Infusion Altar.$()
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.fertilize: Fertilized Essence $(bold)usually$() drops from all $(l:basics/resource_crops)Resource Crops$() $(bold)except Inferium$(). It works identically to Bonemeal, but also works on $(l:basics/resource_crops)Resource Crops$()! $(br2)Fertilized Essence can also be used to more efficiently craft $(l:advances/mystical_fertilizer)Mystical Fertilizer$().
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.mystical_: Mystical Fertilizer is used to instantly grow a crop or sapling. It's effective on $(l:basics/resource_crops)Resource Crops$() too!
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.master_in: The Master Infusion Crystal has infinite durability. You want this, I know you do.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.essence_w: Upgrading the regular $(l:basics/watering_can)Watering Can$() with essences and $(l:advances/mystical_fertilizer)Mystical Fertilizer$() improves your farming experience a ton. $(br2)Upgraded Watering Cans have improved range and growth acceleration speed. You can also toggle automatic watering by Shift + Right Clicking with the Watering Can while not targeting a block.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.sickles.p: Sickles are used for harvesting/destroying large areas of plant material. $(br2)Higher tier Sickles will have a greater area of effect.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.scythes.p: Scythes are used for harvesting large areas of crops by right clicking. Any fully grown crops within the area of effect will be harvested without being uprooted. $(br2)Scythes are also an effective weapon with an increased attack AOE. $(br2)Higher tier Scythes have a greater area of effect.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.soulstone: Soulstone is a special kind of stone that spawns in the Nether. It generates in large veins at all Y levels. $(br2)Soulstone is a decorative block with many variants. It is also required to create $(l:souls/witherproof_blocks)Witherproof Blocks$().
It can also be smelted into Soul Dust, which has many uses as well.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.soulium_o: Soulium Ore $(bold)usually$() spawns inside $(l:souls/soulstone)Soulstone$() veins in the Nether.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.witherpro: Witherproof Blocks are unbreakable by the Wither. Very useful for those who like to cheese bosses. $(br2)They are also immune to damage from the Ender Dragon, however it can still fly though them.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.soulium_d: The Soulium Dagger is used to collect souls from mobs. These souls are collected using $(l:souls/soul_jars)Soul Jars$(). Souls are collected by killing mobs with the Soulium Dagger $(br2)The Soulium Dagger can be upgraded using an $(l:basics/infusion_altar)Infusion Altar$(), improving soul collection efficiency.
The Passive Attuned Soulium Dagger provides an additional +50 percent souls gathered from passive mobs.
The Hostile Attuned Soulium Dagger provides an additional +50 percent souls gathered from hostile mobs.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.soul_jars: Soul Jars are used in combination with a $(l:souls/soulium_dagger)Soulium Dagger$() to collect mob souls. Filled Soul Jars can be used to create $(l:basics/resource_crops)Resource Crops$() for the corresponding entity. $(br2)Soul Jars can also be filled using mob drops with a $(l:machines/soul_extractor)Soul Extractor$().
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.experienc: Experience Capsules are used to collect experience for creating Experience Seeds. $(br2)To collect experience, simply have some Experience Capsules in your inventory and pick up Experience Orbs.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.elemental: WIP $(br2)Air, Earth, Water and Fire essences can be used in $(l:elemental/awakening_altar)Awakening Altar$() recipes using $(l:elemental/essence_vessel)Essence Vessels$().
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.cognizant: Cognizant Dust is $(bold)usually$() obtained by killing a Wither or Ender Dragon using an $(l:tinkering/essence_tools)Essence Weapon$() enchanted with Mystical Enlightenment. $(br2)Higher levels of Mystical Enlightenment will increase the amount of dust dropped on kill.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.essence_v: Essence Vessels are used in the $(l:elemental/awakening_altar)Awakening Altar$() structure to hold the elemental essences required to create items. Each vessel can hold up to 40 of a single elemental essence.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.awakening: The Awakening Altar is a crafting structure that is $(bold)usually$() used to create $(l:elemental/awakened_supremium)Awakened Supremium$(). The structure consists of 1 Infusion Altar, 4 Infusion Pedestals and 4 $(l:elemental/essence_vessel)Essence Vessels$(). $(br2)Once you have a recipe put in place, you just need to activate the altar with a Redstone signal.
Placing the Awakening Altar in world will show you where to place your pedestals and vessels.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.awakened_: Awakened Supremium is a high level crafting material used to create upgraded versions of many of your Supremium items. $(br2)Awakened Supremium is $(bold)usually$() created by infusing $(l:elemental/cognizant_dust)Cognizant Dust$() with a Supremium Block using an $(l:elemental/awakening_altar)Awakening Altar$().
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.machine_u: Machine Upgrades can be placed in applicable machines to increase their effectiveness. $(br2)Higher tier machines will both use and generate power faster.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.essence_f: Upgrading a regular Furnace with essences will increase its cooking speed and fuel efficiency.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.seed_repr: Seed Reprocessors are used to convert your excess seeds into their respective essences. They run off of solid fuels and have an internal power storage buffer.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.soul_extr: Soul Extractors are used to convert mob drops into mob souls. They run off of solid fuels and have an internal power storage buffer. $(br2)The Soul Extractor provides a use for extra mob drops you may have, but generally won't be as efficient as using a $(l:souls/soulium_dagger)Soulium Dagger$().
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.harvester: Harvesters are used to automatically harvest fully grown crops. They run off of solid fuels and have an internal power storage buffer. $(br2)The harvester will automatically re-plant the crops it harvests. $(br2)The harvester will place all resources into it's internal inventory. If there's no space, the items will be placed on the crop.

The Harvester will use a bit of power every time it checks a crop for growth. Harvesting fully grown crops uses an increased amount of power. $(br2)These machines can upgraded with $(l:machines/machine_upgrades)Machine Upgrades$().
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.essence_t: Upgrading your Diamond* tools with essence improves their durability and mining speed. This also allows them to be equipped with $(l:tinkering/augments)Augments$(). $(br2)Essence Tools can be repaired in an Anvil with their corresponding Essence Ingot. These tools each have 1 augment slot.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.essence_a: Upgrading your Diamond* armor with essence improves its durability and protection. This also allows them to be equipped with $(l:tinkering/augments)Augments$(). $(br2)Essence Armor can be repaired in an Anvil with their corresponding Essence Ingot. These armor pieces each have 1 augment slot.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.tinkering: The Tinkering Table is used to add $(l:tinkering/augments)Augments$() to $(l:tinkering/essence_tools)Essence Tools$() and $(l:tinkering/essence_armor)Essence Armor$().
Augments are upgrades for $(l:tinkering/essence_tools)Essence Tools$() and $(l:tinkering/essence_armor)Essence Armor$(). You add Augments to your gear using a $(l:tinkering/tinkering_table)Tinkering Table$(). $(br2)Each Augment has a tier assigned to it, designating the minimum tier of gear piece required to equip it.
You can see what each Augment does in the 'Augments' section of this guide.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.absorptio: The Absorption Augment is an armor augment that grants the user 2-10 Absorption hearts every 8 minutes while they have the armor equipped.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.health_bo: The Health Boost Augment is an armor augment that adds 2-10 hearts to the wearer while they have the armor equipped.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.night_vis: The Night Vision Augment is a helmet augment that grants the wearer Night Vision while they have the armor equipped.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.water_bre: The Water Breathing Augment is a helmet augment that grants the wearer Water Breathing while they have the armor equipped.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.pathing_a: The Pathing AOE Augment is a shovel augment that increases the area that the shovel creates Path blocks, up to 9x9. The AOE is activated by sneaking while using the shovel.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.jump_boos: The Jump Boost Augment is a boots augment that increases the wearers jump height while they have the armor equipped.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.speed_aug: The Speed Augment is a leggings augment that increases the wearers movement speed while they have the armor equipped. This effect is also applied to flight speed.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.mining_ao: The Mining AOE Augment is a tool augment that increases the are that the tool breaks blocks, up to 9x9. Sneaking while breaking a block will negate the AOE effect.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.no_fall_d: The No Fall Damage Augment is a boots augment that negates all fall damage for the wearer while they have the armor equipped.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.tilling_a: The Tilling AOE Augment is a hoe augment that increases the area that the hoe creates Farmland blocks, up to 9x9. The AOE is activated by sneaking while using the hoe.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.fire_resi: The Fire Resistance Augment is an armor augment that grants the wearer Fire Resistance while they have the armor equipped.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.step_assi: The Step Assist Augment is a leggings or boots augment that enables the wearer to walk up 1 block heights without jumping while they have the armor equipped.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.strength_: The Strength Augment is a sword augment that increases the amount of damage the sword deals by 5-20.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.attack_ao: The Attack AOE Augment is a sword augment that increases the attack radius of the sword by up to 6 blocks.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.poison_re: The Poison Resistance Augment is an armor augment that prevents the wearer from getting the poisoned while they have the armor equipped.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.mining_fa: The Mining Fatigue Resistance Augment is an armor augment that prevents the wearer from getting the Mining Fatigue effect while they have the armor equipped.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.wither_re: The Wither Resistance Augment is an armor augment that prevents the wearer from getting the Wither effect while they have the armor equipped.
book.mysticalagriculture.entry.flight_au: The Flight Augment is a chestplate augment that gives the wearer creative flight while they have the armor equipped.
